title: Microsoft Pulls out of GDC - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.27.20
description:
Listen to The Besties free, only on Spotify!

Search your podcast app right now, and subscribe to Gaming Ride Home.

It's Whitta Thursday! Gary joins Blessing to discuss the continuing affects of Coronavirus in the industry along with even more Xbox Series X details.

Time Stamps - 
00:03:20 - Housekeeping
Tomorrow! IGN is putting on a livestream in celebration of Black History Month AND I’m going to be a part of it! Starting at 1:30pm pacific time, come hang out as I get to talk to other black folks in the games industry about their experiences breaking into games. It’s happening from 1:30PM to 4:30PM over on IGN.com and I’ll be on it periodically hanging out, playing games, interviewing folks, and more.
Zelda In Review comes out on the 3rd anniversary of Breath of the Wild...March 3rd, that’s TUESDAY, as a YouTube Premiere at 2pm PT on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
James Davis, Frankfurter, Drew Gardiner, Katie Gallacher, David Meintel, Shiraz Razak, Dominic Shorter, Mohammed Mohammed, Patrick Higgins, Ginny Berndt, The Nano Biologist, Travis  Guy-kow-ski, Joseph Soler
The Roper Report   -
00:09:08 - Microsoft’s Xbox Series X will be able to resume games even after a reboot, this is by Tom Warren of The Verge
00:23:32 - Dreams is looking to improve its trending tab to feature more original content, this is by Matt Kim of IGN
00:29:30 - Is it better for Media Molecule to focus on supporting the creators and players who are already invested or should they be pushing viral content to catch the eyes of the uninitiated? - Best Friends Q:Jamie S
00:33:20 - PlatinumGames is Opening a New Studio, this is by Michael McWhertor of Polygon
00:37:45 - BREAKING NEWS: Microsoft Drops Out Of GDC, Too
This is by Ethan Gach on Kotaku
00:39:07 - The hits for GDC continue as Unity pulls out, this comes from a blog post written by John Riccitiello, CEO of Unity Technologies titled “An update on our GDC 2020 plans”
00:43:03 - As news of the virus spreads and gets in people's ears do you think it will have a long term effect on the games industry?  - Best Friends Q:Frank Furtter
00:46:25 - Dark Pictures Anthology: Little Hope Gets First Details and Release Window, this is by Wesley Leblanc of IGN
00:50:12 - ANNAPURNA REVEALS A NEW GAME, this is from their twitter
00:52:42 - THE BESTIES
00:53:50 -  THE GAMING RIDE HOME PODCAST
00:54:35 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:56:55 -  how do you suspect that Xbox and PlayStation will expand on the “Share” features built into each console? - Fatality 89
01:04:15 - With all the talk of Smart Delivery, and the likelihood of only one copy of a game being sold, with the system determining what version to load, do you expect all versions to be on the disc itself? - Alexis
01:10:15 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
